heading: Weight Lifting
description: the sport or activity of lifting barbells or other heavy weights.

heading: Polo
description: Polo is a team sport played on horseback.

heading: Squash
description: Squash is a racket sport played by two (singles) or four players (doubles) in a four-walled court with a small, hollow rubber ball.

heading: Ice Hockey
description: Ice hockey is a contact team sport played on ice, usually in a rink, in which two teams of skaters use their sticks to shoot a vulcanized rubber puck into their opponent's net to score points.

heading: Handball
description: Handball is a team sport in which two teams of seven players each pass a ball using their hands with the aim of throwing it into the goal of the other team.

heading: Wrestling
description: Wrestling is a combat sport involving grappling type techniques such as clinch fighting, throws and takedowns, joint locks, pins and other grappling holds.

heading: Cycling
description: Cycling, also called bicycling or biking, is the use of bicycles for transport, recreation, exercise or sport.

heading: Basketball
description: Basketball is a sport, generally played by two teams of five players. The objective is to shoot a ball through a hoop to backboards at each end of the court.

heading: Baseball
description: Baseball is a bat-and-ball game played between two teams of nine players each, who take turns batting and fielding.
